body.name: Cora Organic Applicator Tampons | Super Absorbency | 100% Organic Cotton, Unscented, Plant-Based Compact Applicator | Leak Protection, Easy Insertion, Non-Toxic (36 Count)
body.couponInfo: Save an extra 15% on your first Subscribe and Save order.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 16. Order within 6 hrs 34 mins
features: NEW & IMPROVED: The best-selling organic cotton tampon on Amazon, now even better than ever! Made from 100% organic cotton with a new plant-based applicator and an updated design that expands widthwise for ultra confident leak protection. Packaging may vary.

100% ORGANIC COTTON: Tampons made from 100% certified organic cotton – because what you put in your body matters. Made without pesticides, dioxins, rayon, or chlorine; free of fragrance and dyes. FSA/HSA Eligible.
NEW PLANT-BASED APPLICATOR: Sleek, plant-based* compact applicator made from renewable resources for smooth, comfortable insertion. *minimum 92% plant-based plastic

EXPANDS AND PROTECTS: Gently expands to absorb from all angles for a worry-free, comfortable fit and ultra reliable leak protection –so you can roll with your flow. All absorbencies available for light to heavy flows: Light, Regular, Super, Super Plus, and Variety Packs.

EVERY BODY DESERVES COMFORT: We believe everyone should have access to period care–full stop. So, with each Cora purchase, we provide period products and body literacy resources to people who might otherwise go without.
100% HAPPINESS GUARANTEE: If you are not 100% delighted by our goods, reach out to us and we’ll make it right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's a tampon
reviews.reviewText: I keep Cora on auto ship because, ya know, shark week comes monthly.I prefer the Cora without the applicators. I use those in regular and the super with. I can't find a super without.I rotate months auto ship so every other month I have rotating styles come in which keeps my stock perfectly balanced and with both on hand.I prefer this brand to all the others I've tried. And I belive I've tried the all.My next favorite would be something about "my box?" I tried it last month. Not as good as Cora.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Will never buy from another company again.
reviews.reviewText: I love Cora feminine products, They have no harsh chemicals or dyes! I have a condition called PCOS which makes my flow incredibly heavy and I have not once bleed through these tampons, they are wonderful! I try not to use tampons that much because I know they are not the healthiest to use but sometimes I like to take a break from the messy pads (I use Cora pads as well and they are just as great!) and use a tampon. Highly recommend this company and their products especially if you care about what is going inside you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love Cora products as someone with a really heavy flow and easy cramping this is my go to tampon for on the go. I also love their cup for when I’m at home, I’ve definitely noticed with the all cotton and natural tampons my cramping is incredibly better and flow is much more consistent and lighter. My period has also gone from almost 6 days to just 4, could not recommend this more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love the compact packaging!
reviews.reviewText: These are overall great tampons. Comfortable and easy to use. Easy to throw in a pocket. I consider using organic cotton a must for these type of products. Gave them 4 stars mainly because of the price. These products are necessary and should be vastly more affordable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Like these a lot!
reviews.reviewText: I like that these don't have the potential to put harmful chemicals into my body like some other tampons. They work just as well and are very comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Help your lady parts while helping ladies around the world!
reviews.reviewText: This product is amazing! And i love the design of the box and packaging,I never thought a tampon could be chic, but I feel like my vagina has grown up and bought it’s first little black dress!! But I also love what this company stands for, which is helping yourself by helping others! Before Cora I had no idea that the tampons I’ve been using for years have been full of chemicals and bleach, gross! But now I can feel safe and secure using a healthy products, and that I am being a responsible consumer because my purchase helps thos before Cora I had no idea that the tampons I’ve been using for years have been full of chemicals and bleach, gross! But now I can feel safe and secure using a healthy products, and that I am being a responsible consumer because my purchase helps women around the world. The idea of having to miss so much school that you drop out because of your period is daunting, and I think we all take for granted basic necessities that have allowed us to progress as women. I love the sophisticated, simple design of the box and the black packaging, I actually like to have the box displayed in my bathroom. They’re tampons for women... mature... conscious .. thoughtful women!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I do not plan on using another feminine product brand! Cora for the win!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They’re definitely tampons.
reviews.reviewText: They are what they say they are.
